00025 class JMA_Knowledge_Test : public ::testing::Test
00026 {
00027 protected:
00028     virtual void SetUp() {
00029         knowledge_ = new JMA_Knowledge;
00030         ASSERT_TRUE(knowledge_);
00031     }
00032 
00033     virtual void TearDown() {
00034         delete knowledge_;
00035     }
00036 
00037     virtual void loadDictTest() {
00038         knowledge_->setSystemDict(TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT);
00039         knowledge_->addUserDict(TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_USER_DICT);
00040         EXPECT_EQ(1, knowledge_->loadDict());
00041 
00042         EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8, knowledge_->getEncodeType());
00043         MeCab::Tagger* tagger = knowledge_->createTagger();
00044         EXPECT_TRUE(tagger != NULL);
00045         delete tagger;
00046         EXPECT_TRUE(knowledge_->isSentenceSeparator("!"));
00047         EXPECT_TRUE(knowledge_->getCType());
00048         EXPECT_EQ(6, knowledge_->getBaseFormOffset());
00049         EXPECT_EQ(7, knowledge_->getReadFormOffset());
00050         EXPECT_EQ(9, knowledge_->getNormFormOffset());
00051         EXPECT_EQ(69, knowledge_->getUserNounPOSIndex());
00052 
00053         const POSTable& posTable = knowledge_->getPOSTable();
00054         EXPECT_STREQ("O", posTable.getPOS(0, POSTable::POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET));
00055 
00056         const CharTable& kanaTable = knowledge_->getKanaTable();
00057         EXPECT_STREQ("ã¢", kanaTable.toRight("ã"));
00058 
00059         const CharTable& widthTable = knowledge_->getWidthTable();
00060         EXPECT_STREQ("6", widthTable.toLeft("ï¼"));
00061 
00062         const CharTable& caseTable = knowledge_->getCaseTable();
00063         EXPECT_STREQ("A", caseTable.toRight("a"));
00064 
00065         const JMA_Knowledge::DecompMap& decompMap = knowledge_->getDecompMap();
00066         EXPECT_EQ(3u, decompMap.size());
00067     }
00068 
00069     virtual void printDict() {
00070         JMA_Dictionary::instance()->debugPrint();
00071         JMA_UserDictionary::instance()->debugPrint();
00072         getMemoryPool<std::string, Mmap<char> >().debugPrint();
00073         getMemoryPool<std::string, Mmap<short> >().debugPrint();
00074     }
00075 
00076     JMA_Knowledge* knowledge_;
00077 };

00079 TEST_F(JMA_Knowledge_Test, getValueDefault) {
00080     EXPECT_FALSE(knowledge_->isStopWord("aaa"));
00081     EXPECT_TRUE(knowledge_->isKeywordPOS(0));
00082     EXPECT_TRUE(knowledge_->createTagger() == NULL);
00083     EXPECT_FALSE(knowledge_->isSentenceSeparator("!"));
00084     EXPECT_TRUE(knowledge_->getCType() == NULL);
00085     EXPECT_EQ(0, knowledge_->getBaseFormOffset());
00086     EXPECT_EQ(0, knowledge_->getReadFormOffset());
00087     EXPECT_EQ(0, knowledge_->getNormFormOffset());
00088     EXPECT_EQ(-1, knowledge_->getUserNounPOSIndex());
00089 
00090     const POSTable& posTable = knowledge_->getPOSTable();
00091     EXPECT_STREQ("", posTable.getPOS(0));
00092 
00093     const CharTable& kanaTable = knowledge_->getKanaTable();
00094     EXPECT_STREQ(NULL, kanaTable.toRight("bbb"));
00095 
00096     const CharTable& widthTable = knowledge_->getWidthTable();
00097     EXPECT_STREQ(NULL, widthTable.toLeft("ccc"));
00098 
00099     const CharTable& caseTable = knowledge_->getCaseTable();
00100     EXPECT_STREQ(NULL, caseTable.toRight("ddd"));
00101 
00102     const JMA_Knowledge::DecompMap& decompMap = knowledge_->getDecompMap();
00103     EXPECT_EQ(0u, decompMap.size());
00104 }
00105 
00106 TEST_F(JMA_Knowledge_Test, loadFail) {
00107     EXPECT_EQ(0, knowledge_->loadDict());
00108     EXPECT_EQ(0, knowledge_->loadStopWordDict("aaa"));
00109 
00110     vector<string> posVec;
00111     posVec.push_back("bbb");
00112     EXPECT_EQ(0, knowledge_->setKeywordPOS(posVec));
00113 
00114     EXPECT_EQ(0, knowledge_->encodeSystemDict("ccc", "ddd", Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8));
00115     EXPECT_EQ(0, knowledge_->encodeSystemDict(TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT_SOURCE, "eee", Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_UTF8));
00116 }

00119     loadDictTest();
00120 }

00122 TEST_F(JMA_Knowledge_Test, loadDictMultiTimes) {
00123     string strSysDict(TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT);
00124     strSysDict += "/../bin_eucjp";
00125     knowledge_->setSystemDict(strSysDict.c_str());
00126     knowledge_->addUserDict(TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_USER_DICT);
00127     EXPECT_EQ(1, knowledge_->loadDict());
00128     EXPECT_EQ(Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_EUCJP, knowledge_->getEncodeType());
00129     MeCab::Tagger* tagger = knowledge_->createTagger();
00130     EXPECT_TRUE(tagger != NULL);
00131     delete tagger;
00132     EXPECT_TRUE(knowledge_->getCType());
00133 
00134     loadDictTest();
00135 }

00137 TEST_F(JMA_Knowledge_Test, loadStopWordDict) {
00138     EXPECT_EQ(1, knowledge_->loadStopWordDict(TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_STOPWORD_DICT));
00139     EXPECT_TRUE(knowledge_->isStopWord("ã"));
00140     EXPECT_FALSE(knowledge_->isStopWord("A"));
00141 }

00143 TEST_F(JMA_Knowledge_Test, setKeywordPOS) {
00144     knowledge_->setSystemDict(TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT);
00145     EXPECT_EQ(1, knowledge_->loadDict());
00146 
00147     vector<string> posVec;
00148     posVec.push_back("AUV");
00149     EXPECT_EQ(1, knowledge_->setKeywordPOS(posVec));
00150     EXPECT_TRUE(knowledge_->isKeywordPOS(25));
00151     EXPECT_FALSE(knowledge_->isKeywordPOS(33));
00152 }
